decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A 0.01, A 0.02 - Received 13/02/2018. A 4.00, Environment Agency Flood Risk Matrix - Received 28/02/2018. A 0.10, A 0.11, A 0.20, A 0.21, A 0.22, A 0.30, A 1.00 Rev 1, A 1.01 Rev 1, A 2.00 Rev 1, A 2.02 Rev 1, A 2.02 Rev 1, A 3.00 Rev 1 - Received 16/05/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank wall of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The new flank window is to be obscurely glazed and fixed to a minimum height of 1.7m from floor level, and to be retained as such.
description: Erection of a single storey side extension and a new timber framed window at first floor level on side elevation
